ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.

forceReimportTemplate.description:
This property if true will force reimport the template data. Setting it false is
a noop.

githubSigninEnabled.description: Enables the global Sign In With Github for the organization.

gitlabSigninEnabled.description: Enables the global Sign In With Gitlab for the organization.

googleSigninEnabled.description: Enables the global Sign In With Google for the organization.

huggingfaceSigninEnabled.description: Enables the global Sign In With Huggingface for the organization.

reimportTemplate.description:
This is an internal property used to decide if the org template needs to be
reimported.

subject.description:
A tag expression that identifies the authorized user(s). If set it will
configure the complete subject of the admin api authorization, ignoring anything
passed in claims.

type.description:
The type of organization. Either Full or Single. Full represents an organization
that will need to onboard additional users, while Single represents a single
user account.
